com.example.taskaway

Class MyAssignedListViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MyAssignedListViewAdapter.MyViewHolder>
      • com.example.taskaway.MyAssignedListViewAdapter

  • public class MyAssignedListViewAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MyAssignedListViewAdapter.MyViewHolder>
    /** Displays appropriate data when user goes go view all tasks the user has been assigned to (MyAssigned). Used in conjuction with the item_jobs.xml layout. As each item in the layout holds a specifc Textview position, we are able to change the data accordingly.
    See Also:
    MyAssigned, MainActivity, RecyclerView.Adapter
